text: Abram Iosifovich Khasin (Russian: Абрам Иосифович Хасин; 15 February 1923 – 6 February 2022) was a Russian chess international master and correspondence grandmaster. He was born in Zaporizhia, Ukrainian SSR, USSR. He became a chess master in 1964 and a grandmaster in 1972. Khasin also became the USSR Master of Sports in 1950. Khasin died on 6 February 2022 in Essen, Germany at the age of 98. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Russian chess players
title: Abram Khasin
